mapper.select: select sb.subject_id,sb.sub_title, sb.discription, sb.level,sb.adviser_id,sb.design_id,sb.checked,sb.student_id, sh.search_id,sh.search_type, u.nick_name from subject sb,search sh,user u where sb.search_id=sh.search_id and u.id=sb.adviser_id and sb.design_id=#{designId}

select sb.subject_id,sb.sub_title, sb.discription, sb.level,sb.adviser_id,sb.design_id,sb.checked,sb.student_id, sh.search_id,sh.search_type, u.nick_name from subject sb,search sh,user u where sb.search_id=sh.search_id and sb.adviser_id=#{adviserId} and sb.design_id=#{designId}
select u.max_stu from user u where u.id=#{teacherId};
mapper.insert: insert into subject(adviser_id, sub_title, search_id, discription, level, design_id) VALUE (#{adviserId},#{subTitle},#{search.searchId},#{description},#{level},#{designId})
mapper.update: update user set max_stu=#{maxStu} where id=#{teacherId};
update subject sub set sub.student_id=#{stuId},sub.checked=1 where sub.subject_id=#{subId};
update subject sub set sub.checked=0,sub.student_id=null where sub.student_id=#{stuId};
